officer

  • Function reference

read word styles

read word styles and returns a tabular description

read_styles(path)

Arguments

path
path to Word document

Examples

template_dir <- tempfile()
docx_file <- system.file(package = "officer", "template/template.docx")
unzip( zipfile = docx_file, exdir = template_dir )
read_styles( path = template_dir )
#> # A tibble: 9 × 5
#>   style_type            style_id             style_name is_custom is_default
#>        <chr>               <chr>                  <chr>     <lgl>      <lgl>
#> 1  paragraph              Normal                 Normal     FALSE       TRUE
#> 2  character      Policepardfaut Default Paragraph Font     FALSE       TRUE
#> 3      table       TableauNormal           Normal Table     FALSE       TRUE
#> 4  numbering         Aucuneliste                No List     FALSE       TRUE
#> 5  character              strong                 strong      TRUE      FALSE
#> 6  paragraph            centered               centered      TRUE      FALSE
#> 7      table              Grille             Table Grid     FALSE      FALSE
#> 8      table       tabletemplate         table_template      TRUE      FALSE
#> 9      table Listeclaire-Accent2    Light List Accent 2     FALSE      FALSE
